title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Worked as a consultant for IBM, focusing on AI and cloud solutions.
Developed and deployed various AI-driven applications, including document automation, chatbots, and data pipelines.
Worked for clients in healthcare, utilities, and publishing industries.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Led architecture discussions and design reviews to ensure best practices in software development.
Mentored junior developers and provided technical guidance on projects.

title: Owner / Founder
highlights: Founded and manage a successful vacation rental business in the Big Bear.
Developed a custom website using React and Node.js to manage bookings and customer interactions.
Implemented a booking system with payment processing and calendar integration.
Utilized SEO best practices to increase online visibility and drive traffic to the website.
Managed customer service and communication, ensuring high satisfaction rates.

title: IT and Web Development
highlights: Developed and maintained the school's website using WordPress.
Built and maintains computers and network infrastructure for the school.
Provided technical support for staff and students, resolving hardware and software issues.
Worked with Google to get qualified as a Google for Education partner.
Applied to Tech Soup to get computers for the school.
Assisted in the implementation of educational technology tools to enhance learning experiences.
